comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Cropped from original Agence Meurisse photo shown at Bibliotheque Nationale de France's Gallica site, with following caption: "En Belgique : combats de Haelen et de Diest : dans un village près de diest, vérification d'identité " [In Belgium: Battle of Haelen and Diest: In a village near Diest, verifying identity] Pub. Date 1914
